first_interaction.speaker: Henry
first_interaction.text: Uy… May pera ka ba? Baka puwede tayong maglaro ng sugal.

first_interaction.speaker: Henry
first_interaction.text: Kung gusto mo, may alam akong magandang laro na pwedeng subukan.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Henry
repeated_interaction.text: Hey, balik ka na naman! Tara, subukan natin ulit ang sugal.

repeated_interaction.speaker: Henry
repeated_interaction.text: Huwag kang mahihiya, baka swertehin ka ngayon… sama ka na!
